short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Parses transcripts on a youtube video and checks it for harmful language.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: To use this extension. Click on the extension icon while on a youtube video page with an open transcripts panel. The extension will filter out all of the non-offensive transcript segments and underline the offensive words in the remaining transcript.
